characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a grey van
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a snowy road with low visibility. A white sedan is seen ahead on the left side, and a grey van is seen in the middle of the road. The road conditions are slippery due to snow, and visibility is poor.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow and steady speed due to the snowy and slippery road conditions. The vehicle is also keeping a safe distance from the white sedan and the grey van to avoid any potential collisions.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Middle: A grey van, approximately 15 meters away, moving slowly.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a snowy road with low visibility. A black sedan on the left side of the road is seen moving towards the center lane, potentially cutting into the observer vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while monitoring the black sedan on the left side. The vehicle is prepared to decelerate if the black sedan cuts into its lane.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center lane, potentially cutting into the observer vehicles lane.
